title: [Gameplay] Azir attack bug.
body:
Azir keeps walking towards his **Active** solders before of in between commanding his solders to attack, locking Azir and his solders out of their attack til Azir stops moving.

I am no programmer but my best guess would be that Azir is trying to move to where Azir's solders are within his arise cast range before his solders resume attacking normally.

this occurred multiple times during a single play session.

I do use the Galactic Azir skin if that changes anything.

replies.body:
Hey Cato Leo (and other azir mains)

This is a bug we discussed while testing today's hotfix. You basically got it - Azir tries to auto-path after soldier attacks. We ultimately decided to re-enable Azir anyway since the movement command can be cancelled, and Azir normally issues a lot of other commands during a fight that'll naturally overwrite it. It's not ideal, but we felt that it's better to give you Azir back with this bug than to keep him disabled any longer. We'll fix it next patch at the latest! Sorry!
